name: Panakeia
description:
You're an Italian fisherman who, despite a quiet life at sea, is told that your wife has caught an incurable disease. A disease that makes her weaker and weaker. Desperate by your powerlessness, you leave in search of the island thanks to a golden tip. An island where, according to legend, there's said to be the holy grail of life. A grail named after the goddess of medicine, Panakeia.

You play as Carmello through a linear story, where you will face various challenges during your adventure. Challenges that will put your determination to the test.

Level Design

This level was made for a level design course, where I used all kinds of tools to develop a qualitative level. My goal was to work out an atmospheric level by using the seen material. 

Controls

WASD - Walking

Left Click (Hold) - Drag

Right Click (Hold) - Raise Object

E - Pickup

A - Drop

Feedback is always welcome - enjoy, Dre.
